A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw the first film in 1977 when I was 12 and have been a huge fan ever since...I found the first two prequels so dull and have been very happy with the new series...I very much like how The Force Awakens pays homage to the original series and The Last Jedi most definitely does not...I thoroughly enjoyed being surprised throughout the film and found the humor to be a refreshing return that was lost in the oh-so-serious prequels...
